activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7197
activity.text:
Test 1: Record an Audio and download the file.

Record an audio.
Verify its success through notification and reflection in the list.
Verify the file and ensure its reflection in the list as well as notification.
Try to download the file and verify its success using API response with cy.intercept.

By performing the above tasks, you can remove the following tests:

"Verify uploaded file can be edited by author"
"Verify that file download is possible for district admin and above"
"Verify that file download is possible for author"

Test 2: Upload a File and archive it

Upload a file and verify its reflection in the list.
Archive the file and verify the file list along with the reason.

By performing the above tasks, you can remove the test "Archive file and verify it."

Test 3: User-level Based Permission for File Modification

Upload a file using Nurse ID-1 and download it.
Edit the file using Nurse ID-1.
Log in as Nurse ID-2 and verify that the file can't be edited.
Log in as district admin and verify that the file can be edited.

You can remove the test "Verify that file download is possible for users below district admin."

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7197
activity.text:
@AshrafMd-1 

way of approach should be like , use two nurse type and one district admin

Test - 1 Part-1 : Verify the uploaded file can only be modified by the author, district admin, and above users.
- [ ] First, upload a file to a patient file using the nurse user ID-1, and edit the file successfully.
- [ ] Now, log out as nurse user ID-1 and log in as nurse user ID-2. Then try to edit the same file. Expected behavior: "Nurse user ID-2 shouldn't be able to edit the file uploaded by nurse user ID-1." Verify this behavior.
- [ ] Now, log out as nurse user ID-2 and log in as a district admin. Edit the file uploaded by nurse user ID-1. Expected behavior: "The admin should be able to edit the file uploaded by nurse user ID-1."

Test - 1 Part-2 : Verify file download is possible for all users.

- [ ] Verify that the download functionality is working for nurse user ID-1 and the district admin, along with the part-1 test.

@AshrafMd-1 Answer to the question : Only check for district admin and nurse userID

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6217
activity.text:
@suprabathk 
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/1577efb9-7f41-4599-9411-e11b6ff45479)

The bug here is that, initially, when we click the last service detail, the calendar sometimes, becomes only half visible, so, when we try to click on the date to select, on the first click, it makes the component fully visible, and on the next click only the date selection takes place.

The above situation shouldn't be the ideal case, on the first click itself the user should be able to select the date

Note: This bug won't occur, if the user manually scrolls and makes the component fully visible first and click on the date.

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6224
activity.text:
**pointer by QA, can be an enhancement on later version**

- feature works well but few pointers to highlight

1. unless we reload the page manually, newly send messages won't arrive in the doctor notes

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/b9362f06-6ed9-486f-a1c5-15a8a8ab88ea)

2. in the notification no details are been shown such as : Who send it, for which patient, and what is the content of the message 

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/43d5c2d1-ac55-49c7-86c7-637355d0bdd4)

3. We can't write notes in two rows and to send a notice message, we need to explicitly click the send button ( most of the users prefer enter button to send it ) 

![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/dcaf22cc-2747-4d57-911f-7d46652f8334)

4. the system notification are not properly redirected to the respective doctor note

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6223
activity.text:
**Initial Review of QA pointers**

**Works Good**

- Camera Feed privacy is working properly
- Multiple user camera access control working good

**Need to work on before tomorrow's EOD**

- Camera Boundary preview is not working, even though in the network tab, the requests are coming in, and the camera is not moving to show the boundary of the camera view.
- Camera boundary preset is hard to set, as it keeps on rotating to a default preset
- When I am moving the camera, to set a boundary, on each click I get a notification, so change it to show notification only when we set a preset of left, right, or any one side and move to the next one.
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/57055998/ee33f4ad-74d1-4102-9437-8973301a085b)

- The UI shows multiple users and the way the subscribe button is shown not give a good user experience.
- when the second user is trying to move the camera, even though the camera is not moving as expected but, there is no notification showing camera is already in use, request the access to gain control, something like that

Initially, when a user clicks the "Discharge Summary" button to generate it, the discharge summary starts generating. Sometimes, it will be generated instantly, while others may take some time. Once the generation is completed, a "Discharge Summary" section will be visible in the files section, where you can find all the discharge summaries generated for the patient.

Note: if there is no discharge summary present for the patient, the discharge summary section in the file section will be invisible

activity.text:
@aparnacoronasafe 

https://care.coronasafe.in/facility/53a7266a-ed34-4616-85eb-7ae1be57d2cc/patient/4ae3b7de-800d-4b41-8ac9-00dbb741fe9f/consultation/54959916-9496-49ea-9ebe-e1ff579e5557

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/226821072-3e58f58d-6d6c-4fd0-a9fd-9b8856e67541.png)

**Issue:** 

A Patient named "Test-daily-hospitalreport" in the facility "test-march-thirdweek" was initially admitted to the hospital
- on 01/03/2023 to a regular bed
- later on 10/03/2023 he was shifted from a regular bed to icu.
- again on 15/03/2023 he was again shifted back to regular bed.

When we go to the patient tab, apply a filter, admitted to "regular", it is generating a list of all the patients in the regular bed, and we are not able to apply a filter to see, which all patients were admitted in a regular bed, for the period 08/03/2022 to 14/03/2022 because the admit date filter in the advance filter, is only checking the initial admit date of the patient and not the bed change date of the patient

activity.text:
@Ashesh3 After the EOD discussion, we have decided to do the following 

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/202215276-7bcd5f12-9606-4b36-9bb4-fec8b5140428.png)

- [ ] remove the age, which is adjacent to the gender since we are already showing the age along with the name
- [ ] move the badges from the bottom of the card to the right side corner
- [ ] move the blood group from the bottom to the right side, adjacent to the gender.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/202216039-739a978a-5983-4246-a982-2579d152c25c.png)

- [ ] make the tooltip data in a way that, the first row shows the user name, the second row shows the user id and the third row shows the role

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/202216967-aa838a02-0535-4133-a1fd-090852207bf4.png)

- [ ] when a patient is admitted, then only show the admitted on date, and remove admitted - YES

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/202217278-357a2b93-ecf1-4ef4-8018-179d3125d25a.png)

- [ ] when a patient is not admitted, then we should be only showing admitted - No , and remove the admitted on date from the page

activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#2402
activity.text:
@gigincg @cp-Coder test failed

![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321721-f53953cf-9ccc-4bf6-aff0-ad067fd63402.jpg)

- username and password box is coloured with a blue line
- login button is having a black border

![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321908-f2f6aa2f-3b2c-43cc-be6c-70b493d7298d.jpg)

- the notification tab is having by default a black border

![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170321999-07a0ccff-b549-4355-bc72-aa75f7cb18c3.jpg)

- it is hard to view the facility and the patients button in the facility page.

![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322147-3be093c6-57a3-4530-8d2b-27bdbebb62c1.jpg)

- in the facility detail page, all the buttons are having black borders, which is not looking good in the UI
- the separation by a line for the information on oxygen, bed capacity, doctors list, and corona triage is missing

![5](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322260-5177d99d-320b-45a6-91a5-40cca57d74ed.jpg)

- all the heading and the cards are overlapping to each other

![6](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322350-1e8feb20-5489-4a17-86f7-42dd72f76577.jpg)

- in the assets, there is no lines present to separate them.
- the search box and all the buttons are having black border

![7](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322482-22c48ae7-dbfa-479b-a2e0-dd2b722efb7e.jpg)

- the search by name box size is high and overlapping with the button
- live and discharge button is not working smoothly, and the colour of the button is blue with live and dischage
- there is no line separating the patient names
- the add details of a patient button is having black border
- download live list and download all patient buttons having a border would look good.

![8](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322731-7667775f-0295-4300-8691-20e86d0afa59.jpg)

- all the buttons are having black border
- all the user cards are assembles in vertical, and there is a lot of white space been wasted on the right side

![9](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170322909-19a0c85d-8561-485a-938b-742e4dbc7e4e.jpg)

- the active, completed, list view and filters buttons are not looking good
- the datas in the shifting cards look scrambled
- patient name box is having higher space and black border
- all details button is having black border

![10](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323031-92977ba2-e830-4a10-9e32-40755a63a758.jpg)

- the black border is present for the back button and referral letter
- Details of the patient are looking scrambled, a change of UI will be better

![11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323201-119d776f-6eea-40e0-925b-54b2655541fd.jpg)

- doctor video, create investigation and all the buttons are having black border
- when we are clicking the update, summary, etc... button, they are not showing any indication that it is been selected.
- in the nursing analysis, all the cards are overlapping.

![12](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323451-373aaadd-ae35-4f02-817c-684b2dfe3bdd.jpg)

- in the IO Balance plot, intake and output are having black border
- all the graphs are not having any borders

![13](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57055998/170323612-c65d8fa3-7fc8-40bf-bc04-88bc0317c90f.jpg)

- all the boxes having the black border
- the boxes are overlapping
- the boxes are over sized
